List.Name: ATK_SUB_CATEGORY
List.Description: These are categories used by SpEffects to filter when they are applied.

List.Name: ATKPARAM_ATKATTR_TYPE
List.Description: Determines the physical attack "element" of an attack.

List.Name: ATKPARAM_SPATTR_TYPE
List.Description: Determines the non-physical attack "element" of an attack.

List.Name: ATKPARAM_DMGTYPE_NEW
List.Description: These are categories used to determine the type of stagger the player or enemy takes. (AtkParam version)

List.Name: SPEFFECT_DMGTYPE_NEW
List.Description: These are categories used to determine the type of stagger the player or enemy takes. (SpEffect version)

List.Name: GOODS_USE_ANIM
List.Description: These are TAE motion types used to determine item use animations.

List.Name: MAGIC_MOTION_TYPE
List.Description: These are TAE motion types used to determine spell casting animations.

List.Name: SP_EFFECT_TYPE
List.Description: These are state info IDs, which can trigger internal scripts, or are simply used as markers.

Options.Name: Damage Level Change before Poise Break
Decrease number of times magic is used
No use of prohibited items in arena
Remove Effect If Torch In Hand
Follow and warp to player (Spirit Summon)
Scale Attack Power with Equip Load
Trigger in Presence of Blood Loss
Purifying Crystal Tear - Purify Mohg's Nihil
Heal Invader when Blessed Enemy Kills Player
Unknown - Spirit Raisin/Fine Crucible Feather Talisman
Reduce FP Cost of Spirit Summons

List.Name: WEPMOTION_CATEGORY
List.Description: These are TAE motion types used to determine weapon base animations.

List.Name: WEPMOTION_OVERRIDE_CATEGORY
List.Description: These are TAE motion types used to determine weapon override animations.

List.Name: WORLD_MAP_ICON_ID
List.Description: These are IDs for the world map icons.

List.Name: GEM_WEP_ATTR
List.Description: Affinity IDs for Gems (Ashes of War).
